ref-tools.description: Ref Tools - Token-efficient documentation search and URL reading

read_url.description: Use URLs from search results to read detailed content

integration_notes.token_efficiency: Ref filters content to ~5k most relevant tokens
integration_notes.session_tracking: Avoids duplicate results in same session
integration_notes.context_aware: Returns content relevant to search history
integration_notes.hallucination_prevention: Uses real documentation, not model knowledge
